===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|views|view objects to adapt}}
{{par end}}

===Notes===
In order to call the default constructor, {{tt|Views}} must be explicitly provided and all types it contains must be default-initializable.

===Example===
{{example
|An early preview of the example is available in [https://godbolt.org/z/fKaKvd3oh Compiler Explorer].
|code=
#include &lt;algorithm&gt;
#include &lt;ranges&gt;

int main()
{
    using namespace std::ranges;
    
    static constexpr concat_view&lt;empty_view&lt;char&gt;&gt; concat1{}; // overload (1)
    static_assert(equal(concat1, views::empty&lt;char&gt;));
    
    static constexpr auto con = {'c', 'o', 'n'};
    static constexpr char cat[]{'c', 'a', 't', '\0'};
    static constexpr auto concat2{views::concat(con, cat)};   // overload (2)
    static_assert(equal(concat2, "concat"));
}
}}
